[Teacher]: ...! I celebrate all the holidays with my family, as well as the little traditions that are just ours. We have a big dinner at Thanksgiving, and we always watch the same movie, "It's a Wonderful Life," on Christmas Eve. My favorite part of the holidays is that we get to spend time together and make memories that we'll always cherish. Some of the funny stories from past celebrations include the time my brother tried to eat the turkey by himself (he ended up with a mouthful

We don't have any special traditions, but we love going to the park and playing games like tag,

teacher_turns.text: ...! I celebrate all the holidays with my family, as well as the little traditions that are just ours. We have a big dinner at Thanksgiving, and we always watch the same movie, "It's a Wonderful Life," on Christmas Eve. My favorite part of the holidays is that we get to spend time together and make memories that we'll always cherish. Some of the funny stories from past celebrations include the time my brother tried to eat the turkey by himself (he ended up with a mouthful

enjoyable for everyone's sake. You can also enjoy it in the big bowl of hot chocolate while watching the movie, which is another of our special traditions. On Christmas Day, we often go to church, and then come home for a big dinner with the family. In the spring, we like to spend time outdoors, go for a hike or a bike ride, and enjoy the beautiful weather. We don't have any special traditions, but we love going to the park and playing games like tag,
